features: 🌱CALMING DAILY TONER: Dive into serenity with 'Eqqualberry Swimming Pool Toner,' meticulously crafted for daily use on all skin types. Formulated with a low pH, it's unscented and non-alcoholic. This gentle toner soothes and hydrates sensitive and dry skin, preparing it for the next steps in your skincare routine while maintaining a healthy pH balance

🌿MILD EXFOLIATING: Say goodbye to harsh chemicals! Eqqualberry's toner exfoliator uses the naturally derived enzyme KERASOLAZE(DH) to gently remove dead skin cells and minimize pores. Enjoy a healthier-looking complexion without irritation.

🌟 SKIN TRANSFORMATION: Unleash the potential of 'Eqqualberry Swimming Pool Toner' – your daily essential for radiant skin. Nourish, revitalize, and hydrate for visible changes. Shrink pores, clear skin, and enjoy a smoother texture. Elevate your skincare routine with this must-have for both morning and nightly rituals.

💧 ALL DAY HYDRATION: Operating in three stages - exfoliation, strengthening the skin barrier, and locking in moisture - bid farewell to inner skin dryness by applying this toner after cleansing. No more tightness, just hydrated and radiant skin all day long.

🍀BALANCED SKINCARE: Rest easy with EQQUALBERRY, where all ingredients are EWG Green-rated, emphasizing our commitment to safety and environmental responsibility. Elevate your skincare routine with products meticulously crafted to harmonize with your skin, addressing its unique needs and promoting vitality and radiance. Immerse yourself in the perfect blend of quality ingredients and a balanced approach to skincare, meeting your skin's specific requirements.

💙WHY EQQUALBERRY? we take pride in our unwavering commitment to quality. Every ingredient proudly bears the EWG Green-rated label, prominently displayed on our packaging. With eco-friendly containers and a firm stance against indiscriminate animal testing, EQQUALBERRY invites you to choose skincare with a conscience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It turns out to be the best skin toner I've ever had!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Before buying this, I tried many Korean cosmetics that claimed to be good for hydration and strengthening the skin barrier. However, every product I used did not work well; they felt just like water. When they absorbed into my skin, I experienced some dryness. But this product is different. When I apply it to my skin, it makes my skin smoother and hydrates it without leaving a sticky texture. So, I applied it three times after it was absorbed by my skin. It works really well, and I highly recommend it to people who experience dryness and have skin troubles related to hydration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! Clears pores without acid!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this Swimming Pool Toner for about a month. It took me a minute to realize why they named it as it is, “ph balanced”, like a pool has to be ph balanced. Anyway, this is a great, everyday use toner! It’s gentle, would be good for people with sensitive skin. It’s unscented. It’s a toner, so it’s runny, not like a lotion. I use my fingers to apply it, and it absorbs in the skin quickly. My skin looks and feels great! My face looks healthy and revitalized! I usually have large pores on my nose, this toner shrinks them so you can’t even see them. My skin is clear and smooth, and the best thing, I’m not putting harmful chemicals on it! It hydrates nicely. I highly recommend this toner! I will continue using it due to the clean ingredients and fantastic outcome. This is the only thing that has cleaned out my pores besides acid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Leaves skin smooth but dry
reviews.reviewText: MOISTURIZING: I have dry skin, so I was hoping the moisturizing component of this toner might make it a better option for me. However, as much as I like how smooth my skin feels after applying this toner, my skin also feels tight and dry within about 30 seconds of application.SCENT: This has pretty much no smell, which is great if you are sensitive to fragrance.SOOTHING: I have sensitive skin and this did not appear to cause any irritation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: From my wife: This face toner worked well for my combination skin. It’s winter where I am so I need different toner when the air is super dry. I like that this toner cleaned my skin and didn’t have a strong scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was intrigued by this toner because of its name: “swimming pool toner”. My mom always suggested going to the pool to clear my skin, and I have noticed some positive effects after swimming. While I’m not sure what this has to do with a pool, I do like it as a toner. It hasn’t irritated my skin yet and is easy to apply. The texture is similar to water. It hydrates well. My skin feels smooth when I use it. I’d get it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Pool? No Problem! My Skin Loves It!
reviews.reviewText: It seems that the name “Swimming Pool Toner” is just the name, and has nothing to do with limiting the suggested use for this toner. Nowhere on the instructions does it say anything about using after you hop out of the pool.So far, my skin loves this! There is no fragrance. The consistency is runny, but it’s thicker than water. Absorbs quickly and doesn’t dry out my skin. This toner seems to keep my skin more balanced, for when I use it before bed, my facial oils have been keeping under control when I wake up in the morning.Oh, and the first thing I noticed about the packaging was that it includes writing in braille. Really neat and unusual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not just for swimmers
reviews.reviewText: You dont need to use this just after swimming or in the hot tub you can use it anytime and daily. I was able to start using at the same time we ended up going to a indoor water park for two days and either the chlorine didnt dry my face out as I figured it would or this did a pretty good job. The rest of skin needed my oil in the bath and then a thick body butter after for me not to feel my arms and legs were dry feeling. I didnt need anything extra for my face, i kept my routine normal except using this. Now back at home and using daily without going into a pool or chlorinated chemical water it’s still been working really well. In the summer with all the combination of elements I would like to try this during that time to see if its still just as effective with daily pool use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for sensitive skin, otherwise just okay
reviews.reviewText: So far this has been gentle on my extremely sensitive skin. I haven't noticed any dramatic effects in a moisturizing or exfoliating way. However, it hasn't made my skin worse so I enjoy that.This is good as a semi moisturizing, gentle toner, but I prefer toners with more actives. It is currently $21.99 for one bottle. It's not something I would repurchase at this time.
